comments:
The error occurs when I edit the Source Lookup Path and add an external archive

eclipse.buildId=I20061102-1715
java.version=1.5.0_06
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_DE
Framework arguments:  -xMs128m -xMx512m

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-11-15 18:50:58.015
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.sourcelookup.SourceLookupPanel.performApply(SourceLookupPanel.java:344)

	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.sourcelookup.CommonSourceNotFoundEditor$1.widgetSelected(CommonSourceNotFoundEditor.java:152)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:90)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3463)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:3077)

	at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createAndRunWorkbench(PlatformUI.java:149)

Appears we were calling a method on an element which could be null without checking it.

fixed in HEAD

see SourceLookupPanel, CommonSourceNotFoundEditor, and SourceLookupDialog

also added read-only launch config notification in the SourceLookupDialog
*** Bug 165519 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
